Episodes.Title: The Story Begins (1)
Episodes.Plot: Cassie is an A-grade student who joins a posh boarding school called Medenham Hall, built on the back of the slave trade. As term begins, she is subjected to the usual round of humiliating experiences by her peers but this is the least of her worries. Tormented by violent images and pursued by a mysterious man, she realises that she has developed powers that will change her life.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Life Goes On
Episodes.Plot: Cassie learns more about the school's past and Azazeal is closing in, but Cassie has eyes only for Troy.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Possession
Episodes.Plot: There is no doubt that Cassie has changed. She wears sexy tighter clothes; she is hostile with Thelma and exudes attitude. She barely takes notice of young Troy but it only makes him even more desperate to be with her. His friends can't understand why he is allowing himself to be treated this way but he can't resist her.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language

Episodes.Title: The Release
Episodes.Plot: Cassie discovers some shocking news as she struggles to resist the advances of Azazeal. While Thelma attempts to save the day, but can she?
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language
